messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Funky houses
messages.msgSnippet: In Sioux Falls, there is a teal colored house with a beautiful wildflower garden ... they remodeled a couple of years ago and turned their porch into living
messages.messageBody:
In Sioux Falls, there is a teal colored house with a beautiful wildflower
garden ... they remodeled a couple of years ago and turned their porch into
living space and put in a beautiful purple door. It's always been *the purple door
house* and we love to drive by and imagine life there :) Especially since
we've moved away, it's a great funky constant when we go back to visit ... do ya
think they'd be freaked out if we dropped them a post card appreciating their
house??

diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
â€œRelationships are a prerequisite for producing results beyond ourselves.
They expand our imaginations to infinite possibilities that cannot exist in a
life of isolation." --Brian Koslow


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Funky houses
messages.msgSnippet: My friend has a purple house.  It s a pale purple but definately purple. I love it as does my daughter, but I take it the neighbors aren t fond of it.  They
messages.messageBody:
My friend has a purple house. It's a pale purple but definately purple.
I love it as does my daughter, but I take it the neighbors aren't fond
of it. They also have purple carpet... purple is my friend's wife's
favorite color.

joylyn
